title: LLMs as Firmware Experts: A Runtime-Grown Tree-of-Agents Framework
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) and their agent systems have recently demonstrated strong potential in automating code reasoning and vulnerability detection. However, when applied to large-scale firmware, their performance degrades due to the binary nature of firmware, complex dependency structures, and heterogeneous components.
